overview.business_description: Energy equipment supplier delivering temporary power and temperature control solutions, serving industrial, commercial, and event sectors globally. Business model centers on flexible equipment rental with strong recurring revenue from long-term contracts. Former FTSE 250 company taken private in 2021.
business_positives: Recent EUR 407m / USD 715m TLB at E/S+300bps and par (Jan 2026)
Strong strategic interest - ADIA, KKR, CVC exploring stake (Jul 2025)
Triple sponsor backing (TDR, I Squared, Brookfield/Oaktree)
Global market leader in temporary power
Active M&A (Resalta, Crestchic, Mobil in Time acquisitions)
overview.fatal_flaw: S&P downgraded outlook to Negative (Jan 2026). Distress score elevated at 15. Large debt quantum (~$5bn+). Recent TLB add-on increases leverage. Capital intensive business model. Energy transition uncertainty.
overview.ownership: Private - PE consortium. TDR Capital, I Squared Capital, and Brookfield Oaktree Holdings since August 2021 take-private (~$3.86bn deal).
overview.recent_news: Priced EUR 407m / USD 715m TLB add-on at E/S+300bps and par (Jan 2026). S&P revised BB- outlook to Negative (Jan 2026). ADIA, KKR, CVC interested in stake sale (Jul 2025). TLB A&E completed at E/S+300bps (Jun 2025).

quick_assessment.note: Large debt quantum from LBO and subsequent add-ons. Recent TLB issuance increases leverage.

stake_sale_interest.note: Strong strategic interest from major infrastructure investors

credit_opinion.summary: Aggreko is a performing credit with all bonds trading above par (100-104), demonstrating strong market confidence. Recent EUR/USD TLB add-on at E/S+300bps and par shows continued market access. However, the S&P outlook revision to Negative (Jan 2026) is a concern, and distress score of 15 is elevated. Large debt quantum (~$5.5bn) post-recent add-on. Positive that major infrastructure investors (ADIA, KKR, CVC) have expressed interest in stake purchase. Global leader in temporary power with essential infrastructure positioning. Triple sponsor backing provides support but exit path unclear after 4+ years.
key_risks: PE sponsors held since 2021 - exit pressure building
key_catalysts: Successful stake sale to strategic investor

distress_indicators.trading_signals: All bonds at 100-104 (above par). Recent TLB at par shows market support. BUT S&P outlook Negative and distress score elevated. Watch for rating action.
